message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $100?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $100 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $110. This product is truly top-quality and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I understand that the product is high-quality, but I'm still not sure if it's worth $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $90 and $110, so I'll offer $100 again. However, I'm willing to throw in an extra $10 as a one-time discount if you're willing to meet me at $95. What do you think?
